plot_heatmap

Generates heatmap to visualize pairwise IBS sharing between case subjects at the site of interest

ibs_heatmap(consensus, groups = NULL, group.lines = FALSE,
  graphmin = NULL, graphmax = NULL, main = NULL, cx = 0.75)

Arguments

consensus

Data frame containing consensus haplotype segments (columns are riskhap ID, segment start, segment end, and consensus haplotype segment ID. Output from get.consensus().
groups

Vector indicating group membership. Default NULL; if included, subjects will be ordered by group (i.e., subjects in same group will be plotted next to each other.)
group.lines

Logical indicating whether groups should be marked on plot. Default FALSE; if TRUE, gray lines will demarcate groups.
graphmin

Minimum IBS value for plot. Anything lower (but nonzero) will be increased to this value for the plot. Default NULL.
graphmax

Maximum IBS value for plot. Anything higher willl be truncated to this value for the plot. Default NULL.
main

Title of plot
cx

Multiplier for font size for subject labels, graph title. Default 0.75.

Value

Creates IBS heat map.

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
